greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least integer value of (1 + 2^n + 3^n + ... + k^n)/{1 + 2 + 3 + ... + k), k > 1.
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{k = 2}, While[s = 2Sum[i^n, {i, k}]/(k(k + 1)); !IntegerQ[s], k++ ]; s]; Table[ f[n], {n, 25}] (* (Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 02 2004 *)
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 29 2004
ext: Edited and extended by _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 02 2004
